pronunciation.pinyin: mǔ dan suī hǎo , quán zhàng lǜ yè fú
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , quan2 zhang4 lu:4 ye4 fu2

meanings.value: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves . However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
